comment.text: The "SubscriptionCancellation" translation key is used to display a modal dialog header and body text, informing users that they want to cancel their storage plan. This text appears in a modal window on the Portal Settings page, prompting users to confirm cancellation of their subscription.

usage.context:
onClose={onClose} displayType={ModalDialogType.modal} autoMaxHeight isLarge > {t("SubscriptionCancellation")}
{t("WantToCancelStoragePlan")}
